statements: UPDATE MarineSediments SET PollutantConcentration = 15.75 WHERE SedimentLocation = 'North Sea';
UPDATE MarineSediments SET ResearcherID = 102, HabitatType = 'Reef' WHERE PollutantType = 'Oil';
UPDATE MarineSediments SET PollutantConcentration = 15.75, SedimentLocation = 'North Sea' WHERE ResearcherID = 101 AND HabitatType = 'Coral Reef';
UPDATE MarineSediments SET PollutantType = 'Oil', PollutantConcentration = 25.50 WHERE SedimentLocation = 'Pacific Ocean' AND ResearcherID = 201;
UPDATE researchers SET research_specialization='Marine Biology' WHERE researcher_id=1;
UPDATE marine_sediments SET pollutant_level=0.75, habitat_name='Coral Reefs' WHERE sediment_id=3;
UPDATE researchers SET institution = 'University of California' WHERE researcher_id = 1;
UPDATE marine_sediments SET pollutant_level = 4.5, habitat_name = 'Coral Reef' WHERE sediment_id = 3;
UPDATE Researchers SET researcher_name='Alice', researcher_email='alice@example.com' WHERE researcher_id=1;
